paragraph.en: On October ##th 2021, there will be a fiafia night for you, our dear brothers and sisters! A night of entertainment and encouragement, provided by our spiritual family from around the world. If you would like to contribute a performance item to this wonderful evening, please explore this site for ideas :)

paragraph.en: "Come, you yourselves, privately into an isolated place and rest up a little."
paragraph.sm: "Seʻi o tatou ō na o i tatou i se mea tuufua ma fai ai sina mālōlōga."

paragraph.en: "Therefore, whether you are eating or drinking or doing anything else, do all things for God’s glory."
paragraph.sm: "E pei foʻi ona ou faafiafia i tagata uma i mea uma lava, ou te lē o saʻili i soʻu lava lelei ae e mo le lelei o le toʻatele, ina ia faaolaina ai i latou."

paragraph.en: Hello! We are your fellow brothers and sisters bringing to you this evening of entertainment. If you would like to contact us or have any questions not answered on this website, please send an email to thenightbeforeproductions@gmail.com.
